Posts.Content: Bladder, no. Aches, yes. I take Vitamin D, calcium, glucosamine condroiden, and about 1 pain med around 1 pm. Yoga helps a lot. It helps with bladder control, also, I learned in a cancer yoga retreat.
Posts.Title: SIDE EFFECTS FROM ARIMADEX

Posts.Content: An infusion every three weeks for 17 treatments - (3x17 = 52 weeks = one year) so basically you would recieve it every three weeks for one year.
Posts.Title: herceptin treatment for her II + cancer
